name: Luminous Aetheroplasm
description:
Luminous Aetheroplasm is a musical avoidance game featuring an original soundtrack!

Use W/A/S/D to move, avoid red shapes, and try to stay alive till the end. 

-----------------------------------Unrecommended Assist Mode-----------------------------------

If you cannot play through, you can hold H+A+C+K simultaneous to become invulnerable.
